Infrastructure: A vast, empty chamber of polished, black stone. The air is still and cold.
A narrow corridor humming with the faint sound of distant machinery.
A wide platform overlooking a seemingly bottomless chasm. The silence here is heavy.
A junction of several identical-looking passageways. A faint, unpleasant smell lingers.
A collapsed section of a walkway. Debris is scattered everywhere.
Residential: A small, cubical room with walls made of a strange, porous material.
A series of interconnected pods, long since abandoned.
A communal living area, now silent and covered in dust.
A cramped living space, the personal effects of its former owner long gone.
Industrial: A room filled with dormant, monolithic machinery, all covered in a thick layer of dust.
The corridor opens into a massive, spherical space. Strange glyphs cover the walls.
A factory floor, silent except for the dripping of some unknown fluid.
A maintenance tunnel, filled with pipes and cables.

lore_messages: ...system corruption at level 7... Net-Terminal Gene... safeguard protocol...
...the city grows... the builders are gone... only the echoes remain...
...log entry 734. Still no sign of human life with the Net-Terminal Gene. My search continues...
...Warning: Silicon Lifeforms detected in this sector. Proceed with caution...
...Authority Level mismatch. Access to Netsphere denied...
...unknown biological signature detected. Quarantine protocols engaged...
item_logs: A small, metallic sphere. It feels warm to the touch.
A data chip. It appears to be corrupted.
A shard of black material. It seems to absorb the light.
A tattered piece of cloth, the insignia of a long-forgotten faction.

gbe.name: GBE
